metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32629 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ubuntu Kernels overlayfsovl_copy_up_meta_inode_data skip permission checks when callingovl_do_setxattr on Ubuntu kernels

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
